    Make Primer Variant Mutation Dataframe

    makePrimerVarMutationDF.Rd

    Make Primer Variant Mutation Dataframe

    makePrimerVarMutationDF(
  start_date,
  end_date,
  varIds = NULL,
  archiveDBFile,
  subsetDBFile = NULL,
  printableDoubles = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    start_date

    Start date for subset db

    end_date

    End date for subset db

    varIds

    Vector of variant IDs to be used in the visualization, provided if subsetDBFile is NULL (not using Sig_Var_IDs from the subsetDBFile)

    archiveDBFile

    File path to archive db (used to retrieve older subset of data for comparison; older subset uses same length of time as input subset db, e.g. start_date is "2022-5" and end_date is "2022-07", then older subset start date is "2022-02 and "2022-04)

    subsetDBFile

    File path to subset db, provided if using variant IDs from Sig_Var_IDs as those in the visualization (varIds parameter should be NULL if this is provided)

    printableDoubles

    Boolean, default is FALSE, if TRUE will show double mutations for a single variant ID in a single column of the visualization

    Value

    unique_var_table, a table with mutations and trends for each significant variant, comparing this subset to an older subset

    Contents

    Developed by Ashlie Stephenson.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
